alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 8:53PM EST until February 19 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Youngstown. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, water inundates property on River and Front Streets in Girard. In Niles State Route 46 flooded and First Street begins to inundate. In Mahoning County flooding will spread into industrial areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by mid-morning tomorrow. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 700 AM EST.
